summary.para: Specifies whether to clamp color values before the effect passes the values to the next effect in the graph.

param.name: clampoutput
param.para: Type: BOOL
A boolean value indicating whether to clamp the color values. A value of TRUE causes color values to be clamped between 0 and 1.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the first coefficient for the equation used to composite the two input images.

param.name: Coeffcient1
param.para: Type: float
Specifies the first coefficient for the equation used to composite the two input images.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the first coefficient for the equation used to composite the two input images.

param.name: animation
param.para: Type: *
An animation that represents how the value changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the second coefficient for the equation used to composite the two input images.

param.para: Type: float
The second coefficient for the equation used to composite the two input images.

If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the coefficients for the equation used to composite the two input images.

param.name: coefficients
param.para: Type: const
The coefficients for the equation used to composite the two input images.

returns.para: Type: HRESULT
If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: The arithmetic composite effect is used to combine 2 images using a weighted sum of pixels from the input images.
